title: Tablecloth, 1900–49
medium:
Medium: silk, metal, cotton, linen
Technique: counted darning stitch on plain weave
description: Square mustard-yellow linen cloth with a deep border repeat of symmetrical palmette and supporting leaves repeated alternately upright and reverse in heavy silks, cotton, metallic thread. Colors are pink, green, blue and gold.

tombstone.epitaph:
Tablecloth, 1900–49.Medium: silk, metal, cotton, linen
Technique: counted darning stitch on plain weave. 1949-112-2.
